briefTitle: Effect of Aromatase Inhibitors on Breast Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
officialTitle: Phase II Study of the Effect of Acute Aromatase Inhibition on Breast MRI Postmenopausal Women
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Women With Reduced Breast Parenchymal Enhancement
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women are eligible to participate if they are 40 years or older and have been menopausal (had no menstrual bleeding during the past 12 months)

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of bilateral mastectomy, osteoporosis or renal impairment.
